member.name: T:Splat.BitmapLoader
member.summary: This class loads and creates bitmap resources in a platform-independent. way.

member.name: P:Splat.BitmapLoader.Current
member.summary: Gets or sets the current bitmap loader.
member.exception: When there is no exception loader having been found.

member.name: T:Splat.BitmapLoaderException
member.summary: A exception that occurs when there is a problem using or retrieving the .

member.name: M:Splat.BitmapLoaderException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Splat.BitmapLoaderException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message about the exception.

member.name: M:Splat.BitmapLoaderException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message about the exception.
Any other internal exceptions we are mapping.

member.name: M:Splat.BitmapLoaderException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Splat.CompressedBitmapFormat
member.summary: Specifies that compressed bitmap format.

member.name: F:Splat.CompressedBitmapFormat.Png
member.summary: Store the bitmap as a PNG format.

member.name: F:Splat.CompressedBitmapFormat.Jpeg
member.summary: Store the bitmap as a JPEG format.

member.name: T:Splat.IBitmap
member.summary: Represents a bitmap image that was loaded via a ViewModel. Every platform provides FromNative and ToNative methods to convert this object to the platform-specific versions.

member.name: P:Splat.IBitmap.Width
member.summary: Gets the width in pixel units (depending on platform).

member.name: P:Splat.IBitmap.Height
member.summary: Gets the height in pixel units (depending on platform).

member.name: M:Splat.IBitmap.Save(Splat.CompressedBitmapFormat,System.Single,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves an image to a target stream.
member.param: The format to save the image in.
If JPEG is specified, this is a quality factor between 0.0 and 1.0f where 1.0f is the best quality.
The target stream to save to.
member.returns: A signal indicating the Save has completed.

member.name: T:Splat.IBitmapLoader
member.summary: Represents the platform-specific image loader class. Unless you are testing image loading, you don't usually need to implement this.

member.name: M:Splat.IBitmapLoader.Load(System.IO.Stream,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single})
member.summary: Loads a bitmap from a byte stream.
member.param: The stream to load the image from.
The desired width of the image.
The desired height of the image.
member.returns: A future result representing the loaded image.

member.name: M:Splat.IBitmapLoader.LoadFromResource(System.String,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single})
member.summary: Loads from the application's resources (i.e. from bundle on Cocoa, from Pack URIs on Windows, etc).
member.param: The source resource, as a relative path.
Desired width.
Desired height.
member.returns: A future result representing the loaded image.

member.name: M:Splat.IBitmapLoader.Create(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates an empty bitmap of the specified dimensions.
member.param: The width of the canvas.
The height of the canvas.
member.returns: A new image. Use ToNative() to convert this to a native bitmap.

member.name: M:Splat.KnownColors.FromKnownColor(Splat.KnownColor)
member.summary: Gets a SplatColor from a .
member.param: The value to get the color for.
member.returns: A representing the value.

member.name: M:Splat.KnownColors.GetName(System.Int16)
member.summary: Gets a user friendly name for a .
member.param: The numeric value from the enumeration.
member.returns: A human friendly string.

member.name: M:Splat.KnownColors.GetName(Splat.KnownColor)
member.summary: Gets a user friendly name for a .
member.param: The value to convert.
member.returns: A human friendly string.

member.name: M:Splat.KnownColors.FindColorMatch(Splat.SplatColor)
member.summary: Find a SplatColor which matches a .
member.param: The color to get the color match for.
member.returns: A which matched or otherwise.

member.name: M:Splat.KnownColors.Update(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Overrides a known color with the specified new color. This also allows us to teach SplatColor new colors.
member.param: The numeric value representation of the KnownColor.
The ARGB value to set.
member.remarks: This is called (reflection) by System.Windows.Forms.Theme (this isn't dead code)

member.name: T:Splat.SplatColor
member.summary: A platform independent color structure.
A platform independent color structure.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.Empty
member.summary: Gets a full empty which is fully transparent.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.IsEmpty
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current color is transparent black. Eg where R,G,B,A == 0.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.A
member.summary: Gets the alpha component of the color.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.R
member.summary: Gets the red component of the color.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.G
member.summary: Gets the green component of the color.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.B
member.summary: Gets the blue component of the color.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the color if one is known. Otherwise will be the hex value.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.IsKnownColor
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the color is part of the group.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.IsSystemColor
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the color is part of the group.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.IsNamedColor
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the color is par tof the or groups.

member.name: P:Splat.SplatColor.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the color.

member.name: M:Splat.SplatColor.op_Equality(Splat.SplatColor,Splat.SplatColor)
member.summary: Compares two SplatColor references and determines if they are equivalent based on their A,R,G,B values.
member.param: The first SplatColor to compare.
The second SplatColor to compare.
member.returns: If they are equivalent to each other.

member.name: M:Splat.SplatColor.op_Inequality(Splat.SplatColor,Splat.SplatColor)
member.summary: Compares two SplatColor references and determines if they are not equivalent based on their A,R,G,B values.
member.param: The first SplatColor to compare.
The second SplatColor to compare.
member.returns: If they are not equivalent to each other.

member.summary: Creates a SplatColor from the RGB values. The alpha will be set to 255 for full alpha.

The green channel of the color.
The blue channel of the color.
member.returns: A splat color from the specified channels.
